abstract: Oracle is still hungry. The database software giant, which has been making a steady stream of acquisitions as its organic growth has stalled, said Tuesday it would buy Lodestar, which makes software applications used by energy companies. Terms were not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: Oracle is still hungry. The database software giant, which has been making a steady stream of acquisitions as its organic growth has stalled, said Tuesday it would buy Lodestar, which makes software applications used by energy companies. Terms were not disclosed.

headline.main: Oracle to Buy Maker of Software for Utilities
